member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.Windows.CommonForm
member.summary: Host custom user control that will fill entire form. It can be used for non-modal and modal windows. The size of the form will adapt the size of the user control docked. The client codes should generally call the user control to get modal result.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.Windows.CommonForm.AddControl(System.Windows.Forms.UserControl,System.String)
member.summary: Add a UserControl and dock.Fill. This should be called once. More calls attempting to add controls will be ignored.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.Windows.CommonForm.AddControlForDialog(System.Windows.Forms.UserControl,System.String)
member.summary: Add a UserControl and dock.Fill, change style to conventional dialog. This should be called once. More calls attempting to add controls will be ignored.
